channel.title: Trinity-RS, A New VPS Hosted Server
channel.description: Whats up guys, im bluntz and i co-own a new founded server called Trinity-RS, you can find us here www.trinity-rs.com. We have been online for around a week and run on a VPS so no downtime, we are are 317/418 server with various customs and other items, torva primal ect... We are looking for loyal players who will build or community and become our veterans, staff spots are open although no rush into promotions, there are 5 donator ranks a veteran rank and support ranks, we have 12 working bosses with drops,loot share and clan chat working. Bugs and dupes all patched, click to teleport to any skill you wish, a variety of pking setups, working legendary vote box's, staff zone donator zone and member zone, working dungeoneering with chaotics. All non combat stats working and no combat bugs, working turmoil,leechs and soulsplit, summoning fully working with all pets. Heres a little teaser video made by the owner Stonedzombie. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hTlFzhrfkTQ So yeah if you'd like to come and have a look see what you think you can find us at www.trinity-rs.com one simple download link and your online. Thanks for reading, Bluntz.

item.title: Trinity-RS, A New VPS Hosted Server
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

I should hope to god it runs on a vps of some sort, we are in 2016 :o :o :o

Might want to include more details about the server

Read full topic
item.source: Trinity-RS, A New VPS Hosted Server

item.title: Trinity-RS, A New VPS Hosted Server

@ruBluntz wrote:

Whats up guys, im bluntz and i co-own a new founded server called Trinity-RS, you can find us here www.trinity-rs.com. We have been online for around a week and run on a VPS so no downtime, we are are 317/418 server with various customs and other items, torva primal ect… We are looking for loyal players who will build or community and become our veterans, staff spots are open although no rush into promotions, there are 5 donator ranks a veteran rank and support ranks, we have 12 working bosses with drops,loot share and clan chat working.
